showCommandExecutionErrors.desc:: Whether to display errors during command execution: default:true

debugChunkloadAttempts.desc:: Enables debug logging of chunks being forceloaded on serverthread by directly accessing an unloaded chunk, which stalls the server until the chunk finishes loading: default:false

logOffthreadEntityAdd.desc:: Entities should only be added on the server thread itself, cupboard fixes the crashes caused by mods violating that, this option enables the logging of those: default:true
